amendment.description: Amendment sought to require the Federal prison industries to consider 20 percent as a reasonable share of the market for new products.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to limit the market share of any new product produced by the Federal Prisons Industry program to 20% of the total federal purchases of that product.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Collins (GA) amendment (A034) Failed by recorded vote: 182 - 244 (Roll no. 351).
